name: Agrium Inc
title: Agrium profit rises nearly 9 pct on lower costs

content: Aug 5 North American nitrogen fertilizer producers Agrium Inc and CF Industries reported on Wednesday higher second-quarter profits after markets closed.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Fertilizer makers Agrium  CF post higher profits

content: Aug 5 North American nitrogen fertilizer producers Agrium Inc and CF Industries reported higher second-quarter profits on Wednesday after markets closed.
name: Agrium Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Fertilizer makers Agrium  CF post higher profits

content: May 5 Canadian fertilizer and farm retail dealer Agrium Inc reported on Tuesday higher first-quarter profit.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Agrium reports higher quarterly profit; raises dividend 12 pct

content: May 5 Canadian fertilizer and farm retail dealer Agrium Inc on Tuesday reported a first-quarter profit that fell short of expectations  due in part to a late start to the U.S. spring farming season.
name: Agrium Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Agrium quarterly profit disappoints; boosts dividend 12 pct

content: WINNIPEG  Manitoba  March 30 Canpotex Ltd  the offshore potash sales arm of North America's Potash Corp of Saskatchewan   Mosaic Co and Agrium Inc   said on Monday it had set 2015 supply contracts with major Chinese buyers  including Sinofert Holdings Ltd  and expected higher volume.
name: Agrium Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Canpotex sets potash contracts with Chinese buyers

content: WINNIPEG  Manitoba  March 30 Canpotex Ltd  the offshore potash sales arm of Potash Corp of Saskatchewan    Mosaic Co and Agrium Inc  said on Monday it had set 2015 supply contracts with major Chinese buyers  including Sinofert Holdings Ltd.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Canpotex sets potash contracts with Chinese buyers

content: WINNIPEG  Manitoba  Feb 26 Canadian farmers are plowing profits from bumper crops into fertilizer storage facilities to mitigate the pricing power held by major retailers and producers.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Canadian farmers store fertilizer to fight dealers' pricing power

content: Feb 23 Canadian fertilizer and farm retail dealer Agrium Inc reported a 48 percent fall in fourth-quarter profit as expenses rose.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Canada's Agrium profit falls 48 pct

content: NEW YORK  Feb 17 Top U.S. hedge fund management firms  including David Einhorn's Greenlight Capital and Philippe Laffont's Coatue Management  reduced their stakes in Apple Inc  during the fourth quarter  ahead of the iPhone maker's strong rally in 2015  according to regulatory filings.
name: Agrium Inc
title: HIGHLIGHTS-Top U.S. hedge funds cut Apple stakes ahead of all-time high

content: NEW YORK  Feb 17 Top U.S. hedge fund management firms  including David Einhorn's Greenlight Capital and Philippe Laffont's Coatue Management  cut their stakes in Apple Inc  during the fourth quarter  ahead of the iPhone maker's strong rally this year  according to regulatory filings.
name: Agrium Inc
title: CORRECTED-HIGHLIGHTS-Top U.S. hedge funds scale back on Apple ahead of all-time high

content: Jan 22 Canadian fertilizer and farm retail dealer Agrium Inc  said it would pay out a larger percentage of its free cash flow as dividends and buy back up to 5 percent of its shares  driving its stock up as much as 5.6 percent.
name: Agrium Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Agrium shares rise on dividend  buy-back news

content: Jan 22 Canadian fertilizer and farm retail dealer Agrium Inc  said it would pay out 40-50 percent of its free cash flow as dividend  up from its earlier target of 25-35 percent.
name: Agrium Inc
title: Agrium to pay more in dividend
